title: Science Instructional Design Utilizing Growth Mindset: VR-based Pre-service Teacher Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary Science Curriculum Content and Experience in Primary Education Settings
context.additional_context: Recreating real classroom scenarios via VR simulations in BYOD environments, enabling pre-service teachers to practice designing and executing science lessons with growth mindset applications.

learning_goals: Based on growth mindset theory, learners can identify science learning obstacles for elementary students and propose at least three response strategies.
Learners can design growth mindset-based science lessons in a VR simulation environment and apply teaching methods that enhance students' academic self-efficacy.
Learners can analyze formative assessment results to diagnose changes in students' academic fatigue and learning motivation, and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
